channel.title: My client will not work work for anyone else apart from me! HELP!
channel.description: okay so.. if i uploaded my client to a site then a member of my rsps downloaded it they couldn't use it but i can use it. help!

just tell ur friends to use ur actual ip address.

item.title: My client will not work work for anyone else apart from me! HELP!
item.dc:creator: @JamesMayyte JamesMayyte
item.description:
@JamesMayyte wrote:

[quote=“koreybarnett, post:10, topic:355570”]in the client folder open the gui.java file.
hit ctrl+f and search for serverip and check the ip inserted is your ip address or your no-ip address. if its not right change it, compile, run your server and check if you can connect.[/quote]

i have have done this many times and people have alreadyy told me this but ty anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: My client will not work work for anyone else apart from me! HELP!
item.dc:creator: @koreybarnett koreybarnett
item.description:
@koreybarnett wrote:

in the client folder open the gui.java file.
hit ctrl+f and search for serverip and check the ip inserted is your ip address or your no-ip address. if its not right change it, compile, run your server and check if you can connect.

item.title: My client will not work work for anyone else apart from me! HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

In your client, is the IP set to the no-ip name? localhost/127.0.0.1/0.0.0.0 will only work for you.
